snippet.title: Underwater Diving by Mars Touch Studio - AVAILABLE NOW!
snippet.description:
Underwater Diving by Mars Touch Studio
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2178190/Underwater_Diving/
https://gamejolt.com/games/UnderwaterDiving/718086
https://mars-touch-studio.itch.io/underwater-diving

===============

Underwater Diving 1.0.0 RELEASE
Underwater Diving DEMO 1.0.0 AVAILABLE

Underwater Diving has been available since August 7th.
INTRODUCTORY OFFER! 15% OFF
Offer ends 21 Aug 7:00pm CEST

Watch 120s of Gameplay Trailer

===============

In Underwater Diving, you are an underwater diver surrounded by aggressive fish and mines.
With Pixel Art and Retrogaming vibe.
Collect the black corals to clean the idols.
Once all the idols have been cleaned, the exit will be free.

Features:
- USP: Your energy represents both your life and your stamina, but also your oxygen
- You will have to improve your characteristics to survive
- Face underwater creatures and their unique hunting strategies
- Explore and get lost in labyrinthine levels
- More than 50 achievements
- At least 4h to complete the game at 100%

Current release:
- 1.0.0 available for Windows 64-bit on Steam
- DEMO 1.0.0 available for Windows 64-bit on Steam, GameJolt and Itchio

Available on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2178190/Underwater_Diving/

DEMO available on GameJolt:
https://gamejolt.com/games/UnderwaterDiving/718086

DEMO available on Itchio:
https://mars-touch-studio.itch.io/underwater-diving

Official Underwater Diving page:
https://www.mars-touch-studio.com/underwater-diving/

Official Underwater Diving press kit page:
https://www.mars-touch-studio.com/underwater-diving-press-kit/

Follow Mars Touch Studio on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/developer/MarsTouchStudio

Official Mars Touch Studio Website:
https://www.mars-touch-studio.com/
